control.title: Control
control.intro: The best equipment is only as good as its controls. That’s why at Panasonic, we produce a range of superior multi-function camera control panels, remotes, converters and supporting software to ensure your educators and students alike can remain fully in control.

content.name: Product
content.title: Control panels
content.intro: Every model in Panasonic’s professional pan/tilt camera range can be controlled with our intuitive multi-function, high-performance controllers.
list: Full camera control capability, including flexible joystick control
Clear control visibility
Preset memory recall and tracing memory
Flexible customisation features available
Control multiple cameras with one solution

content.name: Case study
content.title: Pitch perfect live streaming with Gothenburg Symphony Orchestra
content.intro:
The Gothenburg Symphony Orchestra has implemented a Panasonic remote camera infrastructure to help live stream its concerts to 150,000 people a month in the highest possible quality. Their television channel broadcasts concerts live and on demand in Full HD, giving classical music enthusiasts around the world the opportunity to experience the world of the Orchestra.
/
And making it all possible? Panasonic technology.

content.name: Technology
content.title: PTZ Control Centre software
content.intro: Control multiple PTZ cameras from one place with our free PC PTZ Control centre software.
list: Centralized management of multiple PTZ cameras
Pan/Tilt/Zoom by buttons, sliders, or a touch on a screen
Camera preset buttons with thumbnails
Camera picture quality adjustment
Simultaneous control of multiple cameras

kairos.title: KAIROS
kairos.intro: The best equipment is only as good as its controls. That’s why at Panasonic, we produce a range of superior multi-function camera control panels, remotes, converters and supporting software to ensure your educators and students alike can remain fully in control.

content.name: Product
content.title: KAIROS Platform
content.intro: KAIROS offers unrestricted flexibility for input, output and operation, giving you efficient production for your expressive live videos.
list: Gain new flexibility and control with KAIROS’ resolution and format independent platform
Engineered with the latest in software and CPU/GPU processing technology – meaning you can allocate your processing power with 100% efficiency
Enjoy uncompressed processing with true uncompressed 4K inputs plus baseband and IP signals simultaneously
Super low 1-frame latency processing

content.name: Case study
content.title: Powering Live IP Production with KAIROS
content.intro: Mediapro chose Panasonic the KAIROS IT/IP video processing platform to produce coverage of eLaLiga Santander – the official tournament of FIFA 21 in Spain. KAIROS was chosen for this eSports project because of its ideal workflow capabilities, its intuitive platform and the ability to configure an infinite number of scenes.

screen.title: ADVANCED LED DISPLAYS
screen.intro: As the world moves to 4K, Panasonic is keeping you one step ahead. Our range of professional-quality displays combine bright, crisp 4K resolution with the ultra-reliable qualities and expandability you’ve come to expect from our LED display technology.

content.name: Product
content.title: Advanced LED Displays
content.intro: Our 4K LED display monitors are already being used in a number of the world’s leading higher education institutions, thanks to their superior image quality and incredible durability.
list: Featuring DIGITAL LINK technology, allowing high-quality video, audio and control transmission over distances of up to 150m with a single LAN cable
Highly durable with high impact resistance, suitable for heavy use and long days
Multi-input screen capability with no processor required

content.name: Case study
content.title: Top marks for AV at the University of Copenhagen
content.intro: The Faculty of Medical Health and Sciences at the University of Copenhagen is expanding. And this ground-breaking new space – housing some of the world’s most advanced facilities for teaching and research into health and disease – needed to provide a student experience to match.</br></br>Enter Panasonic’s ‘AV system of the future’, including our advanced LED display technology.

camera.title: Professional broadcast solutions
camera.intro: Ready to broadcast into the future? We provide industry-leading technologies for media and TV production students to unlock their potential, sharpen their skills and gain knowledge of real-world production techniques.

content.name: Product
content.title: Professional broadcast camera
content.intro: For high-quality video at an affordable cost, our professional broadcast cameras deliver exceptional value.
list: 4K technology for pristine image capture and playback
Suitable for dynamic use – from sports, to live events, to studio production
Backed by premium service from Panasonic, including optional warranty extensions and loans upon request

content.name: Case study
content.title: Unlocking creativity for the next generation
content.intro: When the University of Central Lancashire decided to refit its teaching studio, it turned to Panasonic for its camera system. To serve the facility’s TV Production and Media Production courses, they took advantage of our future-proofed UHD-capable professional camera solutions.

content.name: Technology
content.title: Cutting edge technology over IP
content.intro: Discover how Panasonic Lecture capture over IP helps to extend the classroom by offering digital learning experience: to record classroom or lecture hall presentations and post digital versions online available for either live streaming or download.</br></br>Watch our webinar, where Dean Offord is joined by Neil Burdess from Panopto to explain how we’re transforming the lecture experience.

ptz.title: Remote PTZ Camera Systems
ptz.intro: Since their launch, Panasonic pan tilt zoom (PTZ) cameras have been the education sector’s go-to remote-operation cameras. Designed for the ultimate image quality, speed of implementation, reliability and industry standard interoperability.

content.name: Case study
content.title: Anglia Ruskin graduates to 4K
content.intro: Anglia Ruskin’s TV studio space was the first in the UK to benefit from Panasonic 4K studio camera technology, including new mixing desk equipment, remote operational panels and three Panasonic AK-UC3000 4K cameras, in addition to an overhead AW-UE70 4K remote camera.</br></br>Discover what their lecturers and visiting experts have to say about the technology.

content.name: Case study
content.title: On-the-fly session capture at Cisco Live
content.intro: Cisco Live – the tech giant’s annual customer conference –  as established three decades ago. And in recent years, session capture has become critical for the Cisco online universe.</br></br>When the need for better-quality recordings came into play, the team decided that to move to the next level they’d need a camera system that would not only automatically track a subject, but could be programmed by a user ‘on the fly’.

toughbook.title: TOUGHBOOK
toughbook.intro: Your work in education is extraordinary, as you encourage and grow the next generation of leaders. So the devices you use need to match your extraordinary work step for step. That’s why we build pioneering rugged laptops and 2-in-1's trusted by hardworking students and educators alike.

content.name: TOUGHBOOK devices
content.title: Fixed-Installation Projectors
content.intro: For the heavy traffic, all-day use that education demands, there’s no better solution than the TOUGHBOOK range of laptops and notebooks.
list: Lightweight yet robust hardware that stands the test of time, along with knocks, drops and spills
Extended battery life, plus warm and hot-swap battery options
Superior screen readability in all conditions – perfect for darkened rooms or in bright lights

content.name: Case study
content.title: See TOUGHBOOK in action
content.intro: Don’t just take our word for it. We have hundreds of case studies demonstrating just how far our TOUGHBOOK range of notebooks, tablets and handheld devices can take you.

content.name: Technology
content.title: The latest industry insights
content.intro: At Panasonic, we are constantly working in partnership with renowned institutes and industry experts from across the globe to inform our product development, and discover what’s driving change for tomorrow.</br></br>Why not take a look at our industry whitepapers, and see the latest trends for yourself.
